items.title: Camera
items.text: The OnGea App needs access to your camera, so that you can take photos of your travel tickets/boarding cards and send them to your sending organisation if requested.

items.title: Location
items.text:
The OnGea App needs access to your location data, so that you can inform the staff of your host and/or sending organisation about your current location by pressing the `I am here` button.
The OnGea App won't send your location data anywhere as long as you donâ€™t push that button.
Since the app is not completely examined and ready for production, there will be a test MapView which requires your location, no data will be saved or carried to third party.

items.title: Push Notifications
items.text: The OnGea App needs push-notifications ability to be able to inform the user if plans have suddenly been changed.

items.title: Storage
items.text: The OnGea App needs read and write access to your storage, so that you can download and view important documents, even if you don't have an internet connection.
